headline: NVIDIA Extends AI From Data Centers To Factories Labs And Grids
summary: NVIDIA (NasdaqGS:NVDA) is expanding its AI reach into industrial, scientific, and edge computing through new collaborations with Dassault Systèmes, Opentrons, and EPRI partners. With Dassault Systèmes, NVIDIA is integrating its AI platform into digital twins and modeling tools used across global manufacturing and scientific workflows. Opentrons is adopting NVIDIA technology for AI driven lab robotics that support automated experiments and scientific research. EPRI, Prologis, and NVIDIA are...
